item.title: Every day is full of activities
item.description:
Morning 7.30 - 8.45       Gathering of the kids various calm games 8.30 - 9.00       Breakfast 9.00 - 9.15       Morning exercise 9.30 - 10.15     First lesson 10.30 - 10.45   Fruit breakfast 11.00 - 11.45   Second lesson 12.00 - 13.00   Outside activity
Day 13.00 - 13.30   Lunch 13.30 - 15.30   Nap
